title: subsection (1) of section 73 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Section 73(1))
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Section 73(1)) 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2022 (section 73(1)) (commencement) order 2022

title: subsection (1) of section 73 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2023 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2023 is appointed as the day on which 
subsection (1) of section 73 of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2022. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [713] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
